    About Danielle Py-Salas & Guillermo Salas


    Danielle Py-Salas and Guillermo Salas, former-practicing attorneys, lead one of the top producing real estate teams in the Philadelphia region, The Salas Team. We pride ourselves on providing the highest level of customer service and being leaders in the industry because our customers deserve the very best. We’re a team of real estate professionals with extensive knowledge of all Philadelphia, the Main Line and South Jersey neighborhoods. Whether searching for your Dream Home, Selling Your Home, or looking for an Investment Property, The Salas Team is committed to understanding your unique needs.
